entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023
